pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 27, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.    

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with National President Jerry Dias and members of the leadership of Unifor.

Closed to media.

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Centre Block closing ceremony, and will deliver brief remarks.

Hall of Honour
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

    • Pooled coverage for remarks
    • Media accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery must confirm their attendance in advance. To confirm attendance and for information on accreditation, contact Pierre Cuguen at Pierre.Cuguen@parl.gc.ca
    • Please note that event time is subject to change due to votes.
